item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: What was the start of all this? When did the cogs of fate begin to turn? Perhaps it is impossible to grasp that answer now, From deep within the flow of time But, for a certainty, back then, We loved so many, yet hated so much, We hurt others and were hurt ourselves… Yet even then, we ran like the wind, Whilst out laughter echoed, Under cerulean skies…
